body_html:
Running your benchmark, I saw something very different regarding GPU reduction:

dev gpu size 1024 logical and: 0.004436
dev gpu size 1024 integer add: 0.004852
dev gpu size 1024 float32 add: 0.006709
dev gpu size 1024 logical red: 0.010629
dev gpu size 1024 integer red: 0.011083
dev gpu size 1024 float32 red: 0.007468

dev gpu size 1048576 logical and: 0.012983
dev gpu size 1048576 integer add: 0.067125
dev gpu size 1048576 float32 add: 0.022139
dev gpu size 1048576 logical red: 3.732179
dev gpu size 1048576 integer red: 0.043705
dev gpu size 1048576 float32 red: 0.019991

dev gpu size 10485760 logical and: 0.063713
dev gpu size 10485760 integer add: 0.409385
dev gpu size 10485760 float32 add: 0.124752
dev gpu size 10485760 logical red: 36.839622
dev gpu size 10485760 integer red: 0.384994
dev gpu size 10485760 float32 red: 0.129313

The above was on GTX 960M . It's even worse on TitanX.

body:
Running your benchmark, I saw something very different regarding GPU reduction:

```
dev gpu size 1024 logical and: 0.004436
dev gpu size 1024 integer add: 0.004852
dev gpu size 1024 float32 add: 0.006709
dev gpu size 1024 logical red: 0.010629
dev gpu size 1024 integer red: 0.011083
dev gpu size 1024 float32 red: 0.007468

dev gpu size 1048576 logical and: 0.012983
dev gpu size 1048576 integer add: 0.067125
dev gpu size 1048576 float32 add: 0.022139
dev gpu size 1048576 logical red: 3.732179
dev gpu size 1048576 integer red: 0.043705
dev gpu size 1048576 float32 red: 0.019991

dev gpu size 10485760 logical and: 0.063713
dev gpu size 10485760 integer add: 0.409385
dev gpu size 10485760 float32 add: 0.124752
dev gpu size 10485760 logical red: 36.839622
dev gpu size 10485760 integer red: 0.384994
dev gpu size 10485760 float32 red: 0.129313
```

The above was on GTX 960M . It's even worse on TitanX.
